item.title: 1.10.45-rc
item.description:
RELEASE INFO * Widen new update info area * Fix CTD when attempting to perform a merge on an empty collection * Fix collection mods area forgetting entered text in search box * Fix Irony forgetting ignored localization conflicts
CHANGES FROM v1.9: * Upgrade dependencies * Tweak basic conflict solver merge view * Add advanced merge "view" by allowing you to open diffs in external editor of your choice * Improve version sort * Clear selection upon mod sort * Fix mod compare sort scroll * Improved localization conflict detection and export (warning this is not backwards compatible and could reset a lot of resolved conflicts) * Allow ignore use to ignore partial definition name matches * Custom patches overriding existing mod files will be acknowledged by Irony and replaced during replacement phase and used instead of the source mod file

item.title: 1.10.45-rc
item.description:
RELEASE INFO * Widen new update info area * Fix CTD when attempting to perform a merge on an empty collection * Fix collection mods area forgetting entered text in search box * Fix Irony forgetting ignored localization conflicts
CHANGES FROM v1.9: * Upgrade dependencies * Tweak basic conflict solver merge view * Add advanced merge "view" by allowing you to open diffs in external editor of your choice * Improve version sort * Clear selection upon mod sort * Fix mod compare sort scroll * Improved localization conflict detection and export (warning this is not backwards compatible and could reset a lot of resolved conflicts) * Allow ignore use to ignore partial definition name matches * Custom patches overriding existing mod files will be acknowledged by Irony and replaced during replacement phase and used instead of the source mod file

RELEASE INFO: * Fix Irony not respecting switch back to simple parser (due to a code comment) * Ensure that proper IO readers are selected * Start screen messages are treated as file conflicts now
CHANGES FROM v1.8: * Upgrade to net5 * Upgrade dependencies * Fix conflict solver UI issue with conflict solver dropdown menu opening on the wrong screen (more like Avalonia hack fix) * Add new merge type called compress which zips all mod files into local mod directory * Add option to remove merged mods (for all types unless these mods folders have been renamed)
